channel.title: I'm the Patient, not the Shrink! by Cal Kennedy
channel.managingEditor: imthepatient@solidgoldstudios.co.za (I'm the Patient, not the Shrink! | Solid Gold Studios)
channel.copyright: © Solid Gold Studios - all rights reserved
channel.description:
Just how do you navigate life with a mental illness? What effect does it have on day-to-day activities and future plans? I’m the Patient Not the Shrink takes you on a journey through an ordinary life lived against extraordinary odds. You won’t find easy answers in this book, but you’ll be given a unique insight into the raw and devastating pain of a mental breakdown. Author Cal Kennedy opens a window to the daily struggle of living with polar disorders and dyspraxia. With humor and honesty, Cal explores his own experiences and offers up a rare perspective on the few highs and devastating lows of of these disorders.

p>

another Solid Gold audiobook

image.title: I'm the Patient, not the Shrink! by Cal Kennedy

channel.itunes:subtitle: A true story about living with bipolar, unipolar and dyspraxia.

channel.itunes:summary: Just how do you navigate life with a mental illness? What effect does it have on day-to-day activities and future plans? I’m the Patient Not the Shrink takes you on a journey through an ordinary life lived against extraordinary odds. You won’t find easy answers in this book, but you’ll be given a unique insight into the raw and devastating pain of a mental breakdown. Author Cal Kennedy opens a window to the daily struggle of living with polar disorders and dyspraxia. With humor and honesty, Cal explores his own experiences and offers up a rare perspective on the few highs and devastating lows of of these disorders. Can Lanthus keep it together long enough to pull off his master plan?
